# scFv Gibson Assembly Vector (pGibson-scFv)
# Total size: ~4.8 kb
# Features: T7 promoter, His6 tag, multiple cloning site, ampicillin resistance, ColE1 origin

## Vector Map Features:
# - T7 promoter (1-26)
# - Ribosome binding site (30-35)
# - Start codon ATG (40-42)
# - N-terminal His6 tag (43-60)
# - Gibson cloning site for scFv (61-120)
# - Stop codon TAA (121-123)
# - T7 terminator (130-177)
# - Ampicillin resistance gene (250-1110)
# - ColE1 origin of replication (1200-1788)

## Gibson Assembly Sites:
# Forward primer overlap: 5'-ATGCATCATCATCATCATCATGGT-3' (overlaps with His6 tag)
# Reverse primer overlap: 5'-TTAAGCGGCCGCCTCGAG-3' (overlaps before stop codon)

## Complete Vector Sequence:

>pGibson_scFv_vector
